column1: Baby Barnaby's////This is place is normally pack on a Saturday or Sunday morning. It's location on Westheimer is pretty central
column2: but the parking is pretty horrendous and there's no indoor waiting area for the sweltering heat of summer. Last time I was there
column3: I tried the ham steak. It wasn't the greatest
column4: but it wasn't bad either. My friend tried the chicken and waffles and seemed much more pleased.
